Incomplete/late time entry results in invoicing delays which, in turn, results in EPAM getting paid late by the client. We can all safely say that everyone would like to get paid as soon as possible and EPAM is not an exception.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employees must register time spent on project activities every working day. mobile EPAM CONNECT app. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Time Journal can be filled out at any time convenient for the employee, but no later than 9:00 AM (GMT) of the first working day of the following week (usually Monday) or the first working day of the following month – whichever is earlier. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" There are three basic sections in the Time Journal (TJ): \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PROJECTS\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – this is the billable section. It will be used to generate Edward Jones invoice. Some of you are working on multiple Edward Jones projects at the same time. Please, make sure that the number of hours you enter per project matches your project allocation. If you have any questions about your allocation, please, contact your Project Coordinator/Project Manager. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"NON-PROJECT ACTIVITIES\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – for activities not related to the project, such as training, organizational tasks, bench time, etc. Non-Project activities are divided into two (Other) \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"- Time spent on training, project administration activities, resource bench)\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CSR Social Innovation, educational programs, eKids and Women’s Leadership. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.\\t\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"VACATIONS\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" – filled in automatically in TIME once the vacation request is approved by your manager in Vacation application. Tuesday\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" morning Edward Jones/EPAM Revenue team will run a report for the previous week to make sure that time entry is completed for the previous week. People with incomplete time or any outstanding questions (project allocation, e.t.c.) will get a friendly “Ping” via Teams.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At the end of the month,\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Edward Jones/EPAM Revenue team will ask you to complete time entry ahead of time, so that they can start working on invoice generation as soon as the month closes. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Revenue team appreciates your understanding and cooperation.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
